contents: Article 5 (Grade Deliberation) ① The Sports Council deliberates matters related to the grades of regular member organizations, associate member organizations, and recognized organizations every year. However, member sports organizations that joined in the relevant year are exempt. ② The Sports Association may request the following data from member sports organizations and member city/provincial sports associations in order to deliberate on the member sports organizations’ ratings, and member sports organizations that do not submit data are deemed not to have met the relevant requirements. 1. Member sport organization request: Status of membership of city/provincial sport organizations that have joined the member city/provincial sports association 2. Member city/provincial sports association request: Member city/provincial sport organization membership and grade status, competition holding status 3. Deliberation of other sports councils Requirements determined to be necessary
